name: Traffic VDES A & B
location_str: Launch Area 95A @ Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center, CHN
description: Two technology demonstration satellites for satellite transmissions of signals for the VHF Data Exchange System (VDES), a successor to the current Automatic Identification System (AIS) on ships and maritime vessels for traffic management at sea with higher bandwidth on new frequencies for secure communications and e-navigation.  This project is a joint effort by the China Ministry of Transport's China Transport Telecommunications Information Center and SpaceSail, operator of the Qianfan/G60 constellation.
rocket_fact: The 'Max-Q' callout during launch refers to the moment of maximum dynamic pressure, where structural stress on the vehicle is highest.
